channel.title: Here's a Free Server Status for YOUR server!
channel.description:
I found a server status site where you can add your own server and you paste the code it gives you onto your site and it will say if your server is offline or online.
Like google's server status except this one has NO advertisment or website links on the image for your servers status and you can also choose your customized online or offline picture and it is as simple as just pasting the code onto your site it gives you after entering your servers IP.
http://status.blackout-gaming.net/
Hope you like it, i don't know who the owner of the site is, or i would give credit to him/her, because this as been VERY useful to me :)

item.title: Here's a Free Server Status for YOUR server!
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

This has been around for quiet awhile… I would only use it if you wanted to change the button looks instead of using the rL one.

Read full topic

item.title: Here's a Free Server Status for YOUR server!
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:19, topic:306383”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=402537.msg2987680#msg2987680 date=1255117273]

sux tbh lester

And…? Not many on here can do better than that.
[/quote]“Someone please tell me how you like my server status checker =(”

ofc, I had to tell him[/quote]

I will be honest, the gui was the biggest pain in the ass ever ( FUCK YOU SWING!!! ) but the connection was ~3 minutes.

item.title: Here's a Free Server Status for YOUR server!
item.dc:creator: @lucas445 lucas445
item.description:
@lucas445 wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:17, topic:306383”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=402537.msg2987327#msg2987327 date=1255075802]
sux tbh lester
[/quote]

How does it suck? It sends the packets needed, it has a simple JFrame, and it is Thread safe.[/quote]

Maybe he just finds it easier to type in his server ip then paste the code it gives him
But all in all they both work and both will do the same job

Read full topic
